summary: Test suite for the PNDM diffusion pipeline, containing fast unit tests with a lightweight dummy UNet to verify basic inference behavior and integration tests that run the pipeline on the CIFAR-10 dataset to validate end‑to‑end generation quality.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the PNDM diffusion pipeline across both quick sanity checks and full‑scale inference scenarios, preventing regressions before deployment in image generation applications.
